title: Im having a IP problem
body: For like a good week now my IP has been glitching. It'll say I have a certain amount(Ex.4800) and I goto buy a champion and It would say not enough IP. So then I would relog and then my IP would drop by 100. That happened all of last week and idk how to fix it.

replies.body:
As mentioned by another player in this discussion, this is a bug with your IP value that's displayed in the Beta Client. You should be able to resolve this by swapping over to the Legacy Client (from Login) in order to visit the store and cause another sync of your IP value with the servers.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.

I've had this same problem. It's a bug where your IP displayed is not synced with the actual amount in Riot's database. While I don't know specifics, I'm sure this is something Riot is working on that I'm guessing should be solved by the end of Open Beta.
